title: Câmara (João Gonçalves da)
body: He was born in Portugal and was the son of Simão Gonçalves da Camara (see this name), 3rd Count of Calheta, and D. Maria de Vasconcelos. João Gonçalves da Câmara was the 4th Count of Calheta and is considered the 8th captain-donatary of Funchal, having been confirmed in possession of the captaincy on July 29, 1623.

João Gonçalves da: 4th Count of Calheta and 8th captain-donatary of Funchal

1623: Confirmation of possession of the captaincy
